definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: If the stellar spectrum is known, the albedo of the dust can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 如果恒星的光谱已知，就可得出尘埃的反照率。

sentences.english: The Role of Surface Albedo Feedback in Climate.
sentences.chinese: 气候中地表反照率反馈影响。

sentences.english: Melting of snow and ice affects albedo in two ways.
sentences.chinese: 冰雪融化从两个方面影响反照率。

sentences.english: With the increasement of the single scatter albedo, the decreasing tend of the surface temperature enlarges.
sentences.chinese: 随着单次散射反照率的增加，地面降温幅度也加强。

sentences.english: Cloudy areas can also be areas of radiation deficit because of their higher albedo.
sentences.chinese: 有云区也可能是输射亏损区，因为云有较高的反照率。

definition: liquid water (as opposed to steam or ice)
Titan (moon of Saturn), aka Saturn VI
Io (moon of Jupiter), aka Jupiter I
